item.title: ToHeart remake DLC ‘Extra Stories: Serio & Masashi’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Due out on July 3.

AQUAPLUS has announced ToHeart remake downloadable content “Extra Stories: Serio & Masashi,” which adds a new story featuring the characters Serio and Masashi Satou. It will launch on July 3.

Here are the details:

■ Downloadable Content “Extra Stories: Serio & Masashi”

Scheduled for Release on Thursday, July 3 at 12:00 a.m. JST!

Wishlist it on Steam!

To further enhance your enjoyment of ToHeart, we are excited to announce the release of additional downloadable content starting at 12:00 a.m. on Thursday, July 3, 2025 JST. This downloadable content adds a brand-new story featuring the characters Serio and Masashi Satou, both of whom appear in ToHeart.

Additional stories will not include audio from the original cast.

■ Characters

Serio (newly voiced by Miyuu Hanasaki, originally voiced by Michiko Neya)

Official name HMX-13 type. A prototype of the latest home-use robot developed by Kurusugawa Electronics. She is the sister model of Multi and attends a different school than the protagonist: Saiouji Girls’ Academy, commonly referred to as “Terajo.” Equipped with satellite service functionality, she has the ability to become a professional in various occupations.

Masashi Sato (newly voiced by Nayuta Sugiura, originally voiced by Soichiro Hoshi)

He’s the protagonist and Akari’s childhood friend, and the three of them plus Shiho hang out almost all the time. He belongs to the soccer team and gets along with everyone as a fountain of good vibes—combine that with his solid grades, and you get someone the entire class seems to like. Masashi has one older sister and keeps pet hamsters as a hobby.

ToHeart is available now PC via Steam worldwide, as well as for Switch in Japan.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.
